title: Reflective Practice and Coaching-Based Education for Advanced Instructional Design (ID) Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Students/Job Seekers, Domain Expertise: Advanced, Subject/Job Field: Social Sciences, Delivery Mode: Simulation/VR-Based, Assessment Method: Summative Assessment-Centric, Technology Environment: Bring Your Own Device (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate and improve their own design strategies through reflective practice based on actual instructional design scenarios.
Learners can recognize various instructional design challenges in simulation/VR environments and adapt by applying appropriate solutions.
Learners can experience the process of balancing direct instruction with autonomous design activities based on coaching feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
